title: Playwright Test
description: Playwright Test automates end-to-end web tests across all modern browsers. This actor runs Playwright Test in the cloud and stores the results in the Apify platform.

testCode.title: Test suite code
testCode.description: Contents of the test suite file.

screenWidth.title: Screen width
screenWidth.description: Screen width in pixels. Default is `1280`.

screenHeight.title: Screen height
screenHeight.description: Screen height in pixels. Default is `720`.

headful.title: Run in headful mode
headful.description: Runs tests in headful mode. Default is `false`.

darkMode.title: Dark mode?
darkMode.description: Run tests in dark mode. Default is `false`.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Locale to use for the test. Default is `en-US`.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Maximum runtime for the test suite (in seconds). Default is `60`.

video.title: Record video
video.description: Record video of the test run.

patientName.title: Patient Name
patientName.description: The name of the patient to process.

medications.title: Medications
medications.description: A list of medications prescribed to the patient.
